text: UPS hub destroyed my package. Refuses to pay for contents even though it was fully insured through UPS store. UPS store and UPS point fingers at each other. Disservice to customer. @UPS @UPSHelp @UPS_News #ups

This has been over a 6 month ordeal. UPS lies and deceives in order to weasel their way out of compensation. One of my favorite lies: “Water damaged the package.” Water can’t bend metal and there wasn’t water in the package. @UPS @UPSHelp @UPS_News #ups

Spoken to UPS store corporate and UPS whose tactics include attrition and bullying. At one point a UPS store corporate employee yelled, “We are not in the business of reimbursements!” Not in the business of intact packages, either. @UPS @UPSHelp @UPS_News #ups

@baitsharkEM It sounds like you are frustrated and we would like to look into this more. Can you send us a private message with your contact information and tracking number? ^MS https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ
